clues.text: In 1996 Renat Akchurin performed a 7-hour heart bypass operation on this Russian president
Dr. Audrey Manley is the acting holder of this post for which the Senate rejected Henry Foster in 1995
clues.response: Surgeon General of the United States

clues.text: In 1996 David Kessler, known for battling against tobacco use, resigned as head of this agency

This series features a fox & a wolf, Matthew Fox & Scott Wolf

18th c. bishop Robert Lowth laid down the often-ignored rule that 2 negatives make one of these

This union of atoms may be covalent or ionic

rounds.text: "The Man on Lincoln's Nose" was a working title for this 1959 film
